title: Standard but forgotten script
content:
Did a bunch of fast sketches last week using scripts – and now I can’t remember which one this is. And they want it. Help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925081009im_/http:/typophile.com/files/forgotten_script_4883.jpg)

 [‹ Not quite sure](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925081009/http:/typophile.com/node/44988 "Go to previous forum topic") [Serif Font Identification ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925081009/http:/typophile.com/node/44980 "Go to next forum topic")
author: elzadra

comments.content: Argh, it’s Snell Roundhand, never mind... Sorry.
